titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: WOMEN WITH FIRST OFFERED APPOINTMENT WITHIN 36 MONTHS OF PREVIOUS SCREEN (PERCENTAGE) - Description

div.p: WOMEN WITH FIRST OFFERED APPOINTMENT WITHIN 36 MONTHS OF PREVIOUS SCREEN (PERCENTAGE) is the percentage of eligible women in a NHS Breast Screening Programme whose first offered Breast Screening invitation is within 36 months of their previous Breast Screening test.
